channel.title: ♛ VegasDicing |Gamble RSGP with Dice & Flowers on a RSPS ♛
channel.description:
How we Operate. VegasDicing runs off of a RuneScape Private Server. To bet your RSGP you must buy Coins on the Private Server and then you may gamble with them on Dice/Flower/Staking games there! Instant Cashout | VPS | 24/7
Games we Offer! Flower Poker ABC Dice Duel Frosty Flowers 60x2
How To Play. PM an available rank and ask to buy Vegas GP. Meet on the specified world and trade over your gold 1 Eoc GP = 1 Vegas GP | 1 07 GP = 9 Vegas GP Find an Open host & bet on the game of your choice. If you win you can cash out to RS3/07 - 6% Comission.
Visit the forums at VegasDicing.com
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cTN7cXbsE4I[/youtube]
Take note, I am NOT the Owner of this, just a host and a friend of the owner

item.title: ♛ VegasDicing |Gamble RSGP with Dice & Flowers on a RSPS ♛
item.dc:creator: @wett_dreams wett dreams
item.description:
@wett_dreams wrote:

[quote=“CoderOops, post:2, topic:539226”]Interesting idea.
Will rate be converted like in real rs (osrs coins 9-15 etc)
Where did you get that rate from and is it changing?

Might look forward for this.[/quote]
The rate would be converted like in real rs, where eoc coins = 9 07 coins,
1 eoc coin = 1 vegas GP.
1 07 GP = 9 vegas GP

What happens is whenever you feel like you should be done gambling, you let a host know and they will trade you gp from 07 or eoc equivalent to your vegas GP, with a 6% commision.

Read full topic
item.source: ♛ VegasDicing |Gamble RSGP with Dice & Flowers on a RSPS ♛

How we Operate.
VegasDicing runs off of a RuneScape Private Server. To bet your RSGP you must buy Coins on the Private Server and then you may gamble with them on Dice/Flower/Staking games there! Instant Cashout | VPS | 24/7

Games we Offer!
Flower Poker
ABC
Dice Duel

How To Play.

Meet on the specified world and trade over your gold

If you win you can cash out to RS3/07 - 6% Comission.
